Subject: Re: The Battle
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

The pain searing through his left arm, Menasor finally manages to pull it
out of the force field, and along with it, Firearm's charred body. His arm
he had used lay in absolute ruing, and he nearly dropped Firearm, and had
to switch hands he was using. He again lifted off the ground, his charred
arm laying limp, and headed towards Astroblast, with his prisoner.
